issue.title: drc_practice_task_7.launch all of the valves have fallen off of the wall

message.raw:
Turns out that the valves now are on the wall until the robot is loaded.  They then all move to a single point on the floor.

I am testing this on the latest pre-release 4.17 using the command "roslaunch drcsim_gazebo drc_practice_task_7.launch"
message.html:
Turns out that the valves now are on the wall until the robot is loaded. They then all move to a single point on the floor.

I am testing this on the latest pre-release 4.17 using the command "roslaunch drcsim_gazebo drc_practice_task_7.launch"
